bibl.title: A New Papyrus of the "Comparatio Menandri et Philistionis" (P. Monts. Roca inv. 65).

series.title: Studi e testi per il Corpus dei papiri filosofici greci e latini.

bibl.note: P. Monts. Roca Inv. 65 recto: Comparatio Menandri et Philistionis, ll. 44-63 Jäkel; - verso: unidentified text. Provenance unknown, late Vth - early VIth century. - The papyrus is to appear in the Proceedings of the Helsinki Congress of Papyrologists, 2004.
bibl.seg: TORALLAS TOVAR SofÍa and Klaas A. WORP, A New Papyrus of the "Comparatio Menandri et Philistionis" (P. Monts. Roca inv. 65).
Papiri filosofici. Miscellanea di Studi. V = Studi e testi per il Corpus dei papiri filosofici greci e latini. 14 (Firenze, 2007) pp. 177-184.

P. Monts. Roca Inv. 65 recto: Comparatio Menandri et Philistionis, ll. 44-63 Jäkel; - verso: unidentified text. Provenance unknown, late Vth - early VIth century. - The papyrus is to appear in the Proceedings of the Helsinki Congress of Papyrologists, 2004.
